00043 void Sandbox::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00044 
00045     _nThreads = 1;
00046 
00047     cout << endl << "... ... Initialize with " << _nThreads << " threads ";    
00048 
00049 }

00052 void Sandbox::EvalPair(Topology *top, QMPair *qmpair, int slot) {
00053   
00054     this->LockCout();
00055     cout << "\r... ... Overloading pair " << qmpair->getId() << ". " << flush;
00056     this->UnlockCout();
00057 
00058     int ij;
00059     for (int i = 0; i < 2000; i++) {
00060         for (int j = 0; j < 2000; j++) {
00061             ij = i+j;
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
00066     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit != top->Segments().end(); sit++) {
00067         Segment *seg = *sit;
00068 
00069         vector<Atom*> ::iterator ait;
00070         for (ait= top->Atoms().begin(); ait != top->Atoms().end(); ait++) {
00071             Atom *atm = *ait;
00072 
00073             int id = atm->getId();
00074 
00075         }
00076 
00077         Atom *atm = seg->Atoms()[1];
00078         atm = seg->Atoms()[2];
00079         atm = seg->Atoms()[10000];
00080         atm = seg->Atoms()[14300];
00081 
00082     }
00083 
00084 
00085 }
